function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inefficient building design leading to airborne transmission of infectious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and economic impact","Mitigation":"Improving building ventilation and air filtration systems, implementing social distancing and hygiene measures","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV germicidal irradiation, sensor-based airflow control systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"}]}
